entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: The heir of Slytherin is mentioned as a title or position that someone holds. The text does not provide further information about the person holding this title.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as the main character who has defeated Voldemort and has Parseltongue skills.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as Harry's best friend who was attacked and is now dying.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is introduced as the greatest wizard of all time who was defeated by Harry Potter.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as a person who has many questions for Harry Potter and is smiling pleasantly.

entities.name: diary
entities.description: The diary is an object that Ginny put too much into, which let the spirit leave its pages.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is the heir of Slytherin.
Ginny possessed the diary and put too much into it.
Tom Riddle has many questions for Harry Potter.
Ginny is a friend of Harry Potter.
Lord Voldemort was defeated by Harry Potter.
